quote: Hugely entertaining- Chase is a multi-talented guitarist, singer, actor, writer and comedian. Why he hasn‚Äôt had a special on Netflix or HBO or on Broadway - yet - is beyond me.

name: John Cali
quote: 6 Guitars was the best one man guitar performance I have ever seen. The way the different music genres were strung together made for such a moving musical story. Chase channeled guitar greats while crafting songs on the spot based on his musical charter's interaction with the audience. Even with the impromptu compositions the 6 guitar greats transition into a conclusion of the show that was remarkably poetic and inspirational. I can imagine John Lennon looking down and smiling. Chase Padgett, your musical talent and story telling genius makes you a guitar/performance hero. Bravo.
